content.rendered:
1 Cup/ 236.5 ML Red Lentils
1 Pound/ 0.453592 Kilograms Organic Grass Fed Ground Beef
.25 Cup/ 59.14 ML Minced Garlic
1 tsp/4.928 Organic Cumin
.5 tsp/ 2.464 ML Chili Powder
.5 tsp/ 2.464 ML Turmeric
.5 tsp/ 2.464 Celery Seed
.25 Cup/ 59.14 ML Lemon or Lime Juice
.25 Cup/ 59.14 ML Organic Apple Cider Vinegar
1 — 10 OZ/ 295.735 Can Rotel Tomatoes and Green Chilis
Salt and Pepper To Taste
Olive Oil, First Cold Press with Made on Date
.5 tsp/ 2.464 ML Grass fed Beef Bone Marrow Powder
1 Cup/ 236.5 ML filtered water

Prep time: 30 to 45 minutes
Feeds 2 to 4

Tools:
1 — 2.5 QT Stainless Steel Sauce Pan
1 Bamboo Spoon
Measuring Utensils

Ingredients:
Red Lentils
Grass Fed Beef
Minced Garlic
Organic Cumin
Chili Powder
Turmeric
Celery Seed
Lemon or Lime Juice
Organic Apple Cider Vinegar
Rotel Tomatoes and Green Chilies
Salt and Pepper
Bone Marrow Powder
Olive Oil
Filtered Water

Directions:
Pour a small amount of olive oil into sauce pan and heat to medium. Take 1 Pound/ 0.453592 Kilograms Organic Grass Fed Ground Beef and put into preheated pan. Break apart ground beef and turn up heat, sautéing beef.

Add minced garlic and continue to stir. Add lentils, cumin, chili powder, turmeric and celery seed. Add Rotel tomatoes and simmer.

Add :
In a separate container, combine lemon or lime juice and apple cider vinegar and water. Stir in bone marrow powder and let sit for 5 minutes. Incorporate a small amount of chili broth into liquids and slowly add liquids to chili. Let simmer until lentils are fully cooked, turn off heat and serve.
